text: Soni (mwakumbusyani) lisiku lyatachilosyedwa aŵala ŵaŵakufuulu ku Moto (ni kusalilidwa yanti): “Mwaijonasile yambone yenu pa umi wenu wa duniya, ni mwalisengwasyisye nayo (ku duniyako, basi lelo nganyyipata soni). Basi lelo tillipidwe ilagasyo yakwalusya ligongo lya kulikwesya kwenu kwamwaliji nkulikwesya pa chilambo mwangaŵajilwa, ni ligongo lya kunyosya kwamwaliji nkunyosya.”
